capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape is indeed the title of the potion teacher at Hogwarts. I've had my fair share of dealings with him, and let me tell you, he's a complex individual to say the least. capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been doing some research on Dudley and it turns out that his lineage is quite interesting. capsules_submitted.utterance: So Flitwick is an adult. I've always thought that was a bit surprising, given his small stature. He's definitely not the typical wizarding student, but he's proven himself to be incredibly talented in his own way.

I've heard that Flitwick is an adult, which makes sense given his role as a professor at Hogwarts. I'm not surprised he's considered an adult, to be honest - he does seem quite mature for someone of his age.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon's lineage and maculogy are quite interesting. I've been studying his medical history, and it seems that his family has a strong connection to this particular condition.
